Namespace List

Here is a list of all documented namespaces with brief descriptions:
OpenMeshContains all the mesh ingredients like the polygonal mesh, the triangle mesh, different mesh kernels and mesh traits
OpenMesh::AttributesThis namespace holds per item attributes like normal/color
OpenMesh::ConceptsDescriptions of the concepts used in OpenMesh
OpenMesh::DecimaterSoftware related to mesh decimation
OpenMesh::GenProgUtilities for generative programming
OpenMesh::IOThis namespace contains functions for reading and writing polygonal meshes and a list of supported file formats
OpenMesh::IteratorsContains all mesh iterators and circulators
OpenMesh::Kernel_OSGIn this namespace resides the OpenSG integration of OpenMesh
OpenMesh::Kernel_OSG::FPOpenSG Face Properties Adaptors
OpenMesh::Kernel_OSG::VPOpenSG Vertex Properties Adaptors
OpenMesh::Subdivider::AdaptiveSoftware related to adaptive subdivision of meshes
OpenMesh::Subdivider::UniformSoftware related to uniform subdivision of meshes
OpenMesh::UtilsCollection of little utility classes and helpers
OpenMesh::VDPMSoftware related to view dependent progressive meshes
